org.apache.flink.graph.library.linkanalysis

类 HITS<K,VV,EV>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.graph.utils.proxy.GraphAlgorithmWrappingBase<K,VV,EV,DataSet<T>>
      • org.apache.flink.graph.utils.proxy.GraphAlgorithmWrappingDataSet<K,VV,EV,HITS.Result<K>>
        • org.apache.flink.graph.library.linkanalysis.HITS<K,VV,EV>
  • 类型参数:
    K - graph ID type
    VV - vertex value type
    EV - edge value type
    所有已实现的接口:
    GraphAlgorithm<K,VV,EV,DataSet<HITS.Result<K>>>

    public class HITS<K,VV,EV>
extends GraphAlgorithmWrappingDataSet<K,VV,EV,HITS.Result<K>>
    Hyperlink-Induced Topic Search computes two interdependent scores for every vertex in a directed graph. A good "hub" links to good "authorities" and good "authorities" are linked from good "hubs".

    This algorithm can be configured to terminate either by a limit on the number of iterations, a convergence threshold, or both.

    See http://www.cs.cornell.edu/home/kleinber/auth.pdf

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      private static class  HITS.Authority<T>
      The authority score is the sum of hub scores of vertices on in-edges.
      private static class  HITS.ChangeInScores<T>
      Computes the total sum of the change in hub and authority scores over all vertices between iterations.
      private static class  HITS.ExtractEdgeIDs<T,ET>
      Map edges and remove the edge value.
      private static class  HITS.Hubbiness<T>
      The hub score is the sum of authority scores of vertices on out-edges.
      private static class  HITS.InitializeScores<T>
      Initialize vertices' authority scores by assigning each vertex with an initial hub score of 1.0.
      private static class  HITS.JoinAndNormalizeHubAndAuthority<T>
      Join and normalize the hub and authority scores.
      static class  HITS.Result<T>
      A result for the HITS algorithm.
      private static class  HITS.ScoreConvergence
      Monitors the total change in hub and authority scores over all vertices.
      private static class  HITS.Square<T>
      Compute the square of each score.
      private static class  HITS.Sum
      Sum over values.
      private static class  HITS.SumScores<T>
      Sum vertices' hub and authority scores.
      private static class  HITS.TranslateResult<T>
      Map the Tuple result to the return type.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • HITS

        public HITS(int iterations)
        Hyperlink-Induced Topic Search with a fixed number of iterations.
        参数:
        iterations - fixed number of iterations

      • HITS

        public HITS(double convergenceThreshold)
        Hyperlink-Induced Topic Search with a convergence threshold. The algorithm terminates when the total change in hub and authority scores over all vertices falls to or below the given threshold value.
        参数:
        convergenceThreshold - convergence threshold for sum of scores

      • HITS

        public HITS(int maxIterations,
            double convergenceThreshold)
        Hyperlink-Induced Topic Search with a convergence threshold and a maximum iteration count. The algorithm terminates after either the given number of iterations or when the total change in hub and authority scores over all vertices falls to or below the given threshold value.
        参数:
        maxIterations - maximum number of iterations
        convergenceThreshold - convergence threshold for sum of scores
